tool_description: AI-based sentiment classifier that speaks 100 languages! Just post your text and get a sentiment score back (pos./neutr./neg.). No need to specify your text's language! From Russian over German, English or Spanish to Chinese and Japanese -- everything covered!
name: Multilingual Sentiment Classifier
title: Multilingual Sentiment Classifier

api_list.name: sentiment_classification_v2_ml_sentiment_class__post
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://multilingual-sentiment-classifier.p.rapidapi.com/ml/sentiment-class/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "multilingual-sentiment-classifier.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
